info.+content: Gintoki Sakata, Kagura, and Shinpachi Shimura continue to scrape together a living as the freelance jack-of-all-trades group Yorozuya in Edo while living among the several odd humans and aliens that inhabit the peculiar metropolis.
#1: "Samurai Heart (Some Like It Hot!!)" by SPYAIR (eps 1-13)
